# UndoManager.DidOpenUndoGroupMessage

**Structure**

A message that an undo manager sends after opening an undo group.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DidOpenUndoGroupMessage
```

## Overview

The undo manager posts this message after you call [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/beginUndoGrouping()]. Because this is a “did”-style message, the undo manager sends the message after it opens the undo group.

Observe this message with the identifier [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NotificationCenter/MessageIdentifier/didOpenUndoGroup], or specify its type directly to the `addObserver(of:for:using:)` method. The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NotificationCenter/MainActorMessage/Subject] of this message type is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager].

This message interoperates with the notification [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/Name-swift.struct/NSUndoManagerDidOpenUndoGroup]. The system notifies observers of the message when the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NotificationCenter] posts the notification and vice versa.

## Initializers

- **init()**: Creates a did open undo group message.

## Working with notification messages

- **UndoManager.WillUndoChangeMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends before undoing a change.
- **UndoManager.DidUndoChangeMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends after undoing a change.
- **UndoManager.WillRedoChangeMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends before redoing a change.
- **UndoManager.DidRedoChangeMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends after redoing a change.
- **UndoManager.CheckpointMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends at certain checkpoints.
- **UndoManager.WillCloseUndoGroupMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends before closing an undo group.
- **UndoManager.DidCloseUndoGroupMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends after closing an undo group.

## Conforms To

- NotificationCenter.MainActorMessage
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
